capabilities.title: User Guide
capabilities.description:
Welcome to the AI-Powered Course Discovery Assistant, designed to help UW-Madison students find the most suitable courses based on their interests and goals. This guide will help you effectively use the assistant and craft prompts for personalized course recommendations.
How it works:
The AI-Powered Course Discovery Assistant uses advanced AI to analyze your inputs and provide tailored course suggestions. The more specific and detailed information you provide, the more accurate the recommendations will be.

capabilities.title: Getting Started
capabilities.description:
Type your message or question into the chat interface.
Express your interests, preferred subjects, academic goals, and any other relevant information.

capabilities.title: Crafting Effective Prompts
capabilities.description:
Be specific and detailed:
State your major, interests, current year, desired skills, and goals.
Indicate preferred course formats (lectures, seminars, labs).
Use clear and concise language.
Include relevant background information.
Share your academic background, completed courses, and prerequisites.
State your short-term and long-term academic or career goals.
Ask specific questions about courses, such as workload or content.

capabilities.title: Making the Most of the Assistant
capabilities.description:
Engage in conversation and provide additional context based on the AI's responses.
Be open to exploring new subjects and courses.
Combine AI insights with guidance from your academic advisor.
